sourcesContent:
<button mat-raised-button class="bg-white black" (click)="onClick('hello')" [matMenuTriggerFor]="user">
         <mat-icon>keyboard_arrow_down</mat-icon> Dropdown
        </button>
       
        <mat-menu #user="matMenu">
          <button mat-menu-item>Item 1</button>
          <button mat-menu-item>Item 2</button>
        </mat-menu>
